subject: No test cases found error when tests are in a jar
msgSnippet: We have to put our tests in a jar file...but the TestRunner cannot find them...does junit support loading tests from a jar?  Any advice to make this work is
messageBody:
We have to put our tests in a jar file...but the TestRunner cannot
find them...does junit support loading tests from a jar? Any advice
to make this work is greatly appreciated...thanks. I am using Juni
3.8.2.

Thanks,

Brian
